title: Wanna Be Startin' Somethin'
author: Michael Jackson
lyrics:
[00:24.82] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[00:26.97] You got to be startin' somethin'
[00:28.71] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[00:30.73] You got to be startin' somethin'
[00:32.63] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[00:34.83] You're too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[00:36.61] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[00:38.55] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[00:48.58] I took my baby to the doctor
[00:50.60] With a fever, but nothin' he found
[00:52.48] By the time this hit the street
[00:54.48] They said she had a breakdown
[00:56.55] Someone's always tryin' to start my baby cryin'
[01:00.44] Talkin', squealin', lyin'
[01:02.39] Sayin' you just want to be startin' somethin'
[01:04.24] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[01:06.11] You got to be startin' somethin'
[01:08.19] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[01:10.06] You got to be startin' somethin'
[01:11.93] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[01:14.02] Too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[01:16.14] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[01:18.08] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[01:20.04] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[01:21.89] You're too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[01:23.94] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[01:25.94] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[01:27.79] You love to pretend that you're good
[01:29.80] When you're always up to no good
[01:31.66] You really can't make him hate her
[01:33.74] So your tongue became a razor
[01:35.71] Someone's always tryin' to start my baby cryin'
[01:40.03] Treacherous, cunnin', declinin'
[01:41.76] You got my baby cryin' (hee)
[01:43.65] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[01:45.45] You got to be startin' somethin'
[01:47.50] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[01:49.36] You got to be startin' somethin'
[01:51.40] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[01:53.49] Too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[01:55.26] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[01:57.38] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[01:59.38] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[02:01.03] You're too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[02:03.23] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[02:05.17] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[02:07.36] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[02:09.34] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[02:11.17] Still, they hate you (still, they hate you)
[02:13.12] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[02:15.06] You're just a buffet (you're just a buffet)
[02:17.18] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[02:19.06] They eat off of you (they eat off of you)
[02:20.95] You're a vegetable, ow!
[02:22.33] Hee, ha (ooh!)
[02:30.84] Billie Jean is always talkin' when nobody else is talkin'
[02:34.50] Tellin' lies and rubbin' shoulders
[02:36.49] So they called her mouth a motor
[02:38.74] Someone's always tryin'
[02:40.89] To start my baby cryin'
[02:42.73] Talkin', squealin', spyin'
[02:44.58] Sayin' you just want to be startin' somethin'
[02:46.61] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[02:48.56] You got to be startin' somethin'
[02:50.45] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'

[02:54.32] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[02:56.15] Too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[02:58.43] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[03:00.22] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[03:02.04] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)

[03:06.20] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[03:08.11] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[03:10.03] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[03:11.93] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[03:13.80] Still, they hate you (still, they hate you)
[03:15.69] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[03:17.78] You're just a buffet (you're just a buffet)
[03:19.66] You're a vegetable (you're a vegetable)
[03:21.51] They eat off of you (they eat off of you)
[03:23.93] You're a vegetable, ow!
[03:33.34] Ow!
[03:40.96] Hee-haw! (Ooh!)
[03:49.39] If you can't feed your baby (yeah, yeah)
[03:51.28] Then don't have a baby (yeah, yeah)
[03:53.20] And don't think maybe (yeah, yeah)
[03:55.30] If you can't feed your baby (yeah, yeah)
[03:57.17] You'll be always tryin'
[03:59.14] To stop that child from cryin'
[04:01.40] Hustlin', stealin', lyin'
[04:03.19] Now, baby's slowly dyin'
[04:04.83] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[04:07.01] You got to be startin' somethin'
[04:08.86] I said you wanna be startin' somethin'
[04:10.99] You got to be startin' somethin'
[04:12.87] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[04:14.70] You're too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[04:16.84] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[04:18.70] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[04:20.51] It's too high to get over (yeah, yeah)
[04:22.80] You're too low to get under (yeah, yeah)
[04:24.52] You're stuck in the middle (yeah, yeah)
[04:26.62] And the pain is thunder (yeah, yeah)
[04:28.31] Lift your head up high and scream out to the world
[04:32.04] "I know I am someone," and let the truth unfurl (hee-ha)
[04:36.15] No one can hurt you now, because you know what's true
[04:40.00] Yes, I believe in me, so you believe in you
[04:43.73] Help me sing it
[04:44.62] Ma-ma-se, ma-ma-sa, ma-ma-coo-sa (hoo-hoo)
[04:46.55] Ma-ma-se, ma-ma-sa, ma-ma-coo-sa (hee-hee-hee)
